articles.author: Steven Goff
articles.title: USMNT exits the World Cup looking ahead to 2026 - The Washington Post
articles.description: “Can we win against top teams? Can we perform well against top teams well enough to win? I think this group is close,” Coach Gregg Berhalter said. “The American public should be optimistic.”
articles.content:
Comment on this story
RAYYAN, Qatar To a man, the U.S. mens national soccer team coaches and players spoke of a bright future, of renewed interest in the program and regained respect globally. Their… [+6618 chars]
